summary: This document is an email chain from August 28, 2019, discussing an interview conducted on August 27, 2019, with a purported victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The emails are between law enforcement personnel (FBI and NYPD) and detail the victim's allegations of abuse by Epstein, Bill Clinton, and others, as well as bizarre claims of ritualistic violence witnessed on a yacht. The document concludes with the interviewing agent's assessment that the victim appeared emotionally unbalanced and that no further investigative resources should be expended.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a perpetrator who allegedly raped the purported victim on a yacht in 2000.

persons.name: William J. Clinton
persons.context: Allegedly raped the purported victim on a yacht in 2000, according to the victim's statement.

persons.name: Michael Moore
persons.context: Described as the creator of 'True Pundit' and the person who escorted the purported victim to the FBI building. Has a criminal record for copyright infringement.

persons.name: George Bush 1
persons.context: Allegedly raped the purported victim, according to an addendum in the email.

persons.name: Trump
persons.context: Allegedly present, along with his wife Melania, during a 2000 yacht trip where abuse occurred, though the document notes a factual inconsistency regarding their marriage date.

persons.name: Melania
persons.context: Allegedly present during a 2000 yacht trip where abuse occurred, according to the victim.

persons.name: SA Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Conducted the interview of the purported victim on August 27, 2019, along with the email author.

persons.name: Walter Harkins
persons.context: NYPD Detective with the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force; recipient/forwarder of the email chain.

connections.description: Both are accused by the purported victim of raping him during the same 2000 yacht incident.
Moore escorted the purported victim to the FBI building, according to the victim's disclosure.
Married couple allegedly present together during the 2000 yacht trip described by the victim.
The FBI Special Agent interviewed the purported victim regarding his allegations.

events.title: Alleged Yacht Assault
events.description: The purported victim alleges he was raped by Jeffrey Epstein and Bill Clinton on a large yacht while in a drug-induced state. He also claims to have witnessed bizarre acts of violence and Trump and Melania were present.

events.title: FBI Interview of Purported Victim
events.description: FBI Special Agent Jeffrey Epstein and another agent interviewed a male who claimed to be a victim of Jeffrey Epstein, Bill Clinton, and others. The interview took place at the FBI's C20 office.

events.title: Victim Begins Therapy
events.description: The purported victim reported that his memories of the alleged assaults were 'recovered repressed memories' until he began therapy around this time.

keyFacts: A purported victim gave an FBI interview alleging he was raped by Jeffrey Epstein and former President Bill Clinton on a yacht in 2000, and also by George H.W. Bush.
The victim made extreme, unverifiable claims of witnessing ritualistic violence, dismemberment, and cannibalism on a yacht, which the interviewing agent found lacking corroboration.
The victim stated his memories were 'recovered repressed memories' from therapy that began around 2016.
The interviewing FBI agent assessed the victim as 'emotionally unbalanced' and recommended no further investigative resources be expended on his claims.
The victim was escorted to the FBI by Michael Moore, creator of the conspiracy website 'True Pundit', who has a criminal record from an FBI copyright infringement case.
